text: Kazhutʹ, "Prynosyatʹ vashym svidkam shcho by svidchyly shcho BOH zaboronyv toy chy inshyy." Yakshcho vony svidchatʹ, ne svidchatʹ z nymy. Ne budete vy sliduyete za dumkamy tsykh khto vidkhylyayutʹ nashi vidkryttya, ta tsey khto disbelieve u U maybutnʹomu, ta tsey khto zbyvayutʹsya z shlyakhu daleko z yikhnʹoho Lorda
